Quando il 9 luglio ha ricevuto, come tutti i lavoratori del gruppo, la lettera di Sergio Marchionne , ha deciso di rispondergli altrettanto personalmente. L per l ho pensato di farlo con la mia arma pi forte, il rap; per sarebbe risultato pesante, troppo diretto, didascalico. Allora ho preso carta e penna e ho scritto una lettera, che poi? sta pubblicata da "L'Unit " . Lettera da dipendente, certo; ma nelle cui argomentazioni si intuisce un taglio molto personale, artistico. Cecile Frot-Coutaz says Idol isn't making the mistake of trying to replace Simon Cowell with a facsimile. "You can't, and it would be foolish to try to do that," she says. If you go,` We're going to find another slightly nasty British( recording) executive,' people would reject that because that person would never live up to what Simon Cowell is. That's a recipe for disaster. In our very humble opinion, the only thing you can do is try to create a panel that's entertaining, likable and credible. at GCSE, Mr Michael Gove responded with an emphatic "yes" . He added: "We have given people a nudge with the English Baccalaureate towards a certain set of academic subjects." Beyond that we want to have an informed debate. To gain the English Baccalaureate pupils need good GCSEs in English, maths, science, a modern foreign language, and either history or geography. his book, the former defense chief also ripped into some of George W. Bush 's closest advisers, saying Condoleezza Rice lacked experience and Colin Powell showed poor management skills. He said Colin Powell - George W. Bush 's first top diplomat- did not, in my view, do a good job of managing the people under him, calling leaks out of the State Department "unhelpful."
